n = int(input())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    arr.sort()
    ans = 0
    for i in range(n-1):
        ans += abs(arr[i] - arr[i+1])
    print(ans)
1:
n = int(input())
    strengths = list(map(int, input().split()))
    strengths.sort()
    revenue = 0
    for i in range(n):
        for j in range(i+1, n):
            revenue += abs(strengths[i] - strengths[j])
    print(revenue)
